options.name: Stick Fighter
options.description: Gain +1 Damage with Crushing Weapons and +1 Athletics

options.name: Action : Vault
options.description: If you have used the Move Action on your turn, you can make vaulting Attack against a Creature within 3 Units that has a +2 Attack Bonus while you have a 2-Handed Weapon equipped.

options.name: Reaction : Deflect Blow
options.description: When a Melee Attack is made against you, you can make a Weapon Attack instead of a Block or Dodge Check. If successful, you can redirect the Attack to another Creature that is within reach of the Attacker. This Attack has a -2 Modifier to hit the new target.

options.name: Longstriker
options.description: Gain +1 Unit Range on 2 Handed Weapons

options.name: Action : Guard
options.description: You take an improved version of the Defense Action, gaining an additional +1 Bonus to your Defense Checks and allowing you to make a Melee Attack against any Creature that enters or leaves your Melee Attack Range without consuming a Reaction.
